f_deviceNo,

insert into tb_alarm (f_deviceNo, f_terminalNo, f_isAlarm, f_pressure, f_time, f_state, f_sendTime, f_toPhone, f_deviceSignal) values
(#{item.deviceNo}, #{item.terminalNo}, #{item.isAlarm}, #{item.pressure}, #{item.time}, #{item.state}, #{item.sendTime}, #{item.toPhone}, #{item.deviceSignal})
mapper.update:
update tb_alarm
f_id = #{obj.id}, f_id = null,
f_deviceNo = #{obj.deviceNo}, f_deviceNo = null,
f_terminalNo = #{obj.terminalNo}, f_terminalNo = null,
f_isAlarm = #{obj.isAlarm}, f_isAlarm = null,
f_pressure = #{obj.pressure}, f_pressure = null,
f_time = #{obj.time}, f_time = null,
f_state = #{obj.state}, f_state = null,
f_sendTime = #{obj.sendTime}, f_sendTime = null,
f_toPhone = #{obj.toPhone}, f_toPhone = null,
f_deviceSignal = #{obj.deviceSignal}, f_deviceSignal = null,
and f_id = #{tag.id} and f_id is null
and f_id in(#{item})
and f_id >= #{tag.minId} and f_id < #{tag.maxId} and f_id like '%${tag.subId}%' and f_id like '%${tag.startsWithId}' and f_id like '${tag.endsWithId}%'
and f_deviceNo = #{tag.deviceNo} and f_deviceNo is null
and f_deviceNo in(#{item})
and f_deviceNo >= #{tag.minDeviceNo} and f_deviceNo < #{tag.maxDeviceNo} and f_deviceNo like '%${tag.subDeviceNo}%' and f_deviceNo like '%${tag.startsWithDeviceNo}' and f_deviceNo like '${tag.endsWithDeviceNo}%'
and f_terminalNo = #{tag.terminalNo} and f_terminalNo is null
and f_terminalNo in(#{item})
and f_terminalNo >= #{tag.minTerminalNo} and f_terminalNo < #{tag.maxTerminalNo} and f_terminalNo like '%${tag.subTerminalNo}%' and f_terminalNo like '%${tag.startsWithTerminalNo}' and f_terminalNo like '${tag.endsWithTerminalNo}%'
and f_isAlarm = #{tag.isAlarm} and f_isAlarm is null
and f_isAlarm in(#{item})
and f_isAlarm >= #{tag.minIsAlarm} and f_isAlarm < #{tag.maxIsAlarm} and f_isAlarm like '%${tag.subIsAlarm}%' and f_isAlarm like '%${tag.startsWithIsAlarm}' and f_isAlarm like '${tag.endsWithIsAlarm}%'
and f_pressure = #{tag.pressure} and f_pressure is null
and f_pressure in(#{item})
and f_pressure >= #{tag.minPressure} and f_pressure < #{tag.maxPressure} and f_pressure like '%${tag.subPressure}%' and f_pressure like '%${tag.startsWithPressure}' and f_pressure like '${tag.endsWithPressure}%'
and f_time = #{tag.time} and f_time is null
and f_time in(#{item})
and f_time >= #{tag.minTime} and f_time < #{tag.maxTime} and f_time like '%${tag.subTime}%' and f_time like '%${tag.startsWithTime}' and f_time like '${tag.endsWithTime}%'
and f_state = #{tag.state} and f_state is null
and f_state in(#{item})
and f_state >= #{tag.minState} and f_state < #{tag.maxState} and f_state like '%${tag.subState}%' and f_state like '%${tag.startsWithState}' and f_state like '${tag.endsWithState}%'
and f_sendTime = #{tag.sendTime} and f_sendTime is null
and f_sendTime in(#{item})
and f_sendTime >= #{tag.minSendTime} and f_sendTime < #{tag.maxSendTime} and f_sendTime like '%${tag.subSendTime}%' and f_sendTime like '%${tag.startsWithSendTime}' and f_sendTime like '${tag.endsWithSendTime}%'
and f_toPhone = #{tag.toPhone} and f_toPhone is null
and f_toPhone in(#{item})
and f_toPhone >= #{tag.minToPhone} and f_toPhone < #{tag.maxToPhone} and f_toPhone like '%${tag.subToPhone}%' and f_toPhone like '%${tag.startsWithToPhone}' and f_toPhone like '${tag.endsWithToPhone}%'
and f_deviceSignal = #{tag.deviceSignal} and f_deviceSignal is null
and f_deviceSignal in(#{item})
and f_deviceSignal >= #{tag.minDeviceSignal} and f_deviceSignal < #{tag.maxDeviceSignal} and f_deviceSignal like '%${tag.subDeviceSignal}%' and f_deviceSignal like '%${tag.startsWithDeviceSignal}' and f_deviceSignal like '${tag.endsWithDeviceSignal}%'
